description: Complete ESO Scribing Database - Unified Source of Truth

dataValidation.validationStatus: Auto-updated with 599 missing ability IDs from exact name matches
dataValidation.extractionMethod: Corrected against official ESO Hub documentation (Section 8.2)

commonIssues: Some grimoire + focus combinations are not valid in ESO
Name transformations may show placeholder text like 'CombinationXSignatureAffixClass'
Ultimate grimoires (Ulfsild's Contingency, Wield Soul) have limited focus script compatibility

cost.notes: Base costs are shown in grimoires data. Focus/Signature/Affix modifiers vary by specific scripts chosen.

metadata.note: This section is now integrated into nameTransformations. Kept for reference.
